ISSUE.TITLE: Display author name in plugin list for locally installed plugins
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.1 ### Feature type Change to existing functionality ### Triage priority I volunteer to perform this work (if approved) ### Proposed functionality Display author name for locally installed plugins if set in the plugin config. ### Use case Display full information for plugins that are installed. ### Database changes None ### External dependencies None
